net.pandoragames.far.ui.swing.component.listener

Class OperationCallBackListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.pandoragames.far.ui.swing.component.listener.OperationCallBackListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProgressListener

    public class OperationCallBackListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProgressListener
    Implementation of the ProgressListener inteface for the file search. Allows other components to register in order to get informed about the state of currently running searches.
    Author:
    Olivier Wehner

      • addComponentStartReseted

        public void addComponentStartReseted(java.awt.Component com,
                            OperationType type)
        Adds a component that will be reseted on start. The component must implement the interface Resetable, otherwise the call will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        com - to be reseted on operation start
        type - operation type that will trigger the behaviour
